titles.title: To amend the Surface Mining Control and Reclamation Act of 1977 to terminate payments to States certified under that Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Mineral Resources.

bill.summary: 12/20/2011--Introduced. Amends the Surface Mining Control and Reclamation Act of 1977 to prohibit payments from the Abandoned Mine Reclamation Fund to a state or Indian tribe certified as having completed coal reclamation.
